--- File name : lua.lua.txt
--- DateTime : 2021/04/12
--- Description : 
---

local crt = CS.DeusFramework.Basic.DfCoroutine

lua = {
    ---开启Lua协程，并在协程中执行函数，...对应函数的参数
    ---@param func function 在协程中执行的函数
    start_coroutine = function(func, ...)
        local co = coroutine.create(func)
        assert(coroutine.resume(co, ...))
    end,

    ---WaitUntil
    wait_until_sync = function(func)
        util.async_to_sync(crt.WaitUntilForSync, true)(func)
    end,

    ---WaitUntil
    wait_until_async = function(func, callback)
        crt.WaitUntilForSync(callback, func)
    end,

    ---WaitWhile
    wait_while_sync = function(func)
        util.async_to_sync(crt.WaitWhileForSync, true)(func)
    end,

    ---WaitWhile
    wait_while_async = function(func, callback)
        crt.WaitWhileForSync(callback, func)
    end,

    ---WaitForSeconds
    wait_seconds_sync = function(seconds)
        util.async_to_sync(crt.WaitForSecondsForSync, true)(seconds)
    end,

    ---WaitForSeconds
    wait_seconds_async = function(seconds, callback)
        crt.WaitForSecondsForSync(callback, seconds)
    end,

    ---WaitForEndOfFrame
    wait_end_frame_sync = function()
        util.async_to_sync(crt.WaitForEndOfFrameForSync, true)()
    end,

    ---WaitForEndOfFrame
    wait_end_frame_async = function(callback)
        crt.WaitForEndOfFrameForSync(callback)
    end,

    ---WaitForFixedUpdate
    wait_fixed_update_sync = function()
        util.async_to_sync(crt.WaitForFixedUpdateForSync, true)()
    end,

    ---WaitForFixedUpdate
    wait_fixed_update_async = function(callback)
        crt.WaitForFixedUpdateForSync(callback)
    end,

    ---WaitForOneFrame
    wait_one_frame_sync = function()
        util.async_to_sync(crt.WaitForOneFrameForSync, true)()
    end,

    ---WaitForOneFrame
    wait_one_frame_async = function(callback)
        crt.WaitForOneFrameForSync(callback)
    end
}
